languages.text: {n}...обрывки разноцветных проводов. Неважно, откуда ворон их выдрал — лучше припрятать их куда подальше, иначе Паскаль чудовищно расстроится из-за такого неуважения к священным машинам.{/n}

{n}...a cluster of torn multi-coloured wires. It matters little where {petname} ripped these from — you had better hide them. Pasqal will be incensed if he hears about such a show of disrespect toward sacred machines.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...обрывки разноцветных проводов. Неважно, откуда ворон их выдрал — лучше припрятать их куда подальше, иначе Паскаль чудовищно расстроится из-за такого неуважения к священным машинам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}...a cluster of torn multi-coloured wires. It matters little where {petname} ripped these from — you had better hide them, or else Pasqal will be incensed by such disrespect toward sacred machines.{/n}

languages.text: {n}…引きちぎられた色とりどりのワイヤーの束だ。{petname}がこれをどこから引きちぎったのかは大した問題ではない─とにかく隠したほうがいい。聖なる機械に対するこのような無礼な行為を耳にすれば、パスカルは激怒するだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a cluster of torn multi-coloured wires. It matters little where {petname} ripped these from — you had better hide them. Pasqal will be incensed if he hears about such a show of disrespect toward sacred machines.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}…引きちぎられた色とりどりのワイヤーの束だ。{petname}がこれをどこから引きちぎったのかは大した問題ではない─とにかく隠したほうがいい。聖なる機械に対するこのような無礼な行為を耳にすれば、パスカルは激怒するだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}... ein Haufen ausgerissener Drähte in verschiedenen Farben. Es spielt keine Rolle, woher {petname} sie hat – du solltest sie verstecken. Pasqal wäre erzürnt, wenn er von einer derartigen Respektlosigkeit gegenüber heiligen Maschinen erführe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a cluster of torn multi-coloured wires. It matters little where {petname} ripped these from — you had better hide them. Pasqal will be incensed if he hears about such a show of disrespect toward sacred machines.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}... ein Haufen ausgerissener Drähte in verschiedenen Farben. Es spielt keine Rolle, woher {petname} sie hat – du solltest sie verstecken. Pasqal wäre erzürnt, wenn er von einer derartigen Respektlosigkeit gegenüber heiligen Maschinen erführe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}... un amas de câbles colorés. Peu importe où {petname} a pu les trouver, vous feriez mieux de les dissimuler rapidement. Pasqal serait furieux d'apprendre qu'une créature a pu faire montre d'un tel irrespect envers les machines sacrées.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a cluster of torn multi-coloured wires. It matters little where {petname} ripped these from — you had better hide them. Pasqal will be incensed if he hears about such a show of disrespect toward sacred machines.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}... un amas de câbles colorés. Peu importe où {petname} a pu les trouver, vous feriez mieux de les dissimuler rapidement. Pasqal serait furieux d'apprendre qu'une créature a pu faire montre d'un tel irrespect envers les machines sacrées.{/n}

languages.text: {n}... un puñado de cables arrancados de diversos colores. Poco importa de dónde los ha sacado {petname}; más vale que los escondas. Pasqal montará en cólera si se entera de que se ha cometido semejante falta de respeto por las sagradas máquinas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a cluster of torn multi-coloured wires. It matters little where {petname} ripped these from — you had better hide them. Pasqal will be incensed if he hears about such a show of disrespect toward sacred machines.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}... un puñado de cables arrancados de diversos colores. Poco importa de dónde los ha sacado {petname}; más vale que los escondas. Pasqal montará en cólera si se entera de que se ha cometido semejante falta de respeto por las sagradas máquinas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}……那是一串被撕成碎片的彩色电缆。{petname}从哪里扯下了这些电缆并不重要，重要的是，你最好赶紧把它们藏起来。要是让帕斯卡发现了这种亵渎神圣机器的行为，他恐怕会火冒三丈。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a cluster of torn multi-coloured wires. It matters little where {petname} ripped these from — you had better hide them. Pasqal will be incensed if he hears about such a show of disrespect toward sacred machines.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}……那是一串被撕成碎片的彩色电缆。{petname}从哪里扯下了这些电缆并不重要，重要的是，你最好赶紧把它们藏起来。要是让帕斯卡发现了这种亵渎神圣机器的行为，他恐怕会火冒三丈。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Rengârenk kablolardan oluşan bir demet. Kim bilir {petname} bunları nereden kopardı? İyisi mi onları saklamalısın. Pasqal, kutsal makinelere yapılan bu saygısız davranışı öğrenirse çok öfkelenir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a cluster of torn multi-coloured wires. It matters little where {petname} ripped these from — you had better hide them. Pasqal will be incensed if he hears about such a show of disrespect toward sacred machines.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Rengârenk kablolardan oluşan bir demet. Kim bilir {petname} bunları nereden kopardı? İyisi mi onları saklamalısın. Pasqal, kutsal makinelere yapılan bu saygısız davranışı öğrenirse çok öfkelenir.{/n}
